column4: UPDATE 4-Twitter seeks NBA  MLS  Turner deals to stream sports - Recode
column5: July 8 Twitter Inc is in talks with the NBA  Major League Soccer and Time Warner Inc's cable network Turner Broadcasting to buy digital streaming rights for content related to major sports and events  Recode reported.

column4: BRIEF-Twitter looking to ink more NFL-style streaming deals -Recode
column5: * Twitter talking to the NBA  MLS and Turner to buy rights to more sports streams -Recode  citing sources

column4: BRIEF-Valero starts crude topping unit at Houston refinery
column5: HOUSTON  July 8 Valero Energy Corp has started operations on a 90 000 barrel per day (bpd) crude topping unit at its 100 000 bpd refinery in Houston  a company spokeswoman said on Friday.

column4: Striking Wal-Mart workers in China return to work - for now
column5: SHANGHAI/CHICAGO Workers striking at Wal-Mart Stores Inc  outlets in China have returned to work after the firm agreed to consider their protests against a new work scheduling system that some fear could be used to cut overtime pay  workers and labor activists say.

column4: REFILE-UPDATE 2-Striking Wal-Mart workers in China return to work - for now
column5: SHANGHAI/CHICAGO  July 8 Workers striking at Wal-Mart Stores Inc outlets in China have returned to work after the firm agreed to consider their protests against a new work scheduling system that some fear could be used to cut overtime pay  workers and labor activists say.
